titleStmt.title: The schoole of vertue and booke of good nourture for chyldren, and youth to learne theyer dutie by. Newely persued, corrected, and augmented by the fyrst auctour. F.S with a briefe declaration of the dutie of eche degree. Anno. 1557.
titleStmt.author: F. S. (Francis Segar), fl. 1549-1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Hedgehogge by Wyllyam Seares,

notesStmt.note: Seager's name in an acrostic on verso of A1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
